players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I suspect Alice is the mafia; she was too eager to investigate. Diana looks innocent."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. We should vote him out."
Diana: "Alice, if Bob is mafia, why did you claim you investigated him? Bob is innocent. I think the mafia is still alive."
Diana: remained silent.
Bob: "your message"
You: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I'm the detective, I know you're mafia."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I suspect Alice is the mafia; she was too eager to investigate. Diana looks innocent."
Alice: "I investigated Bob last night and found him to be the mafia. We should vote him out."
Diana: "Alice, if Bob is mafia, why did you claim you investigated him? Bob is innocent. I think the mafia is still alive."
Diana: remained silent.
You: "your message"
Alice: "Bob, you killed Charlie. I'm the detective, I know you're mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
